title: bobanobunaga
author: bobanobunaga
created_time: May 03, 2023, 01:05:54 PMLast edit: May 27, 2023, 06:03:18 PM by bobanobunaga
content: TOCZ - a Memetoken for BNB Ecosystem   Hi Dear Blockchain Fans , as a respect to bitcointalk.com we would like to notify here first , we are building a memecoin for especially to BNB ecosystem MissionWe love CZ and BNBChain .For sure that CZ involved lot of new features to crypto space and opened a new age in crypto industry in few years.Now we see that some parties trying to left him alone while CZ is to stand alone all fudders around about cryptoWe all love blockchain and will do our best to exist forever and show that CZ and BNB Chain is not alone VisionTocz is a memetoken and main purpose is to become a trustable ,sustainable digital store of valueDue to our respect to CZ,BNBChain and BNB Ecosytem, we will proceed this project professionally, transparently and everything is open anyone in blockchainTOKENOMICSTOCZ will be issued with supply 10,091,977,268,115 TOCZ TokenContract 0x2bcbeeda9efce6b409989f0ac655fdffc4913bde  No ICO , No Team token.  Will fairlaunch to equal rights for anyone on BNBChainWe recommend to buy TOCZ on Pancakeswap to fuel TOCZ power by fees and support to DefiToken FeaturesBURN 1% of taxes on transaction deductions will be used for the decrease the supply amount manualyAUTO LIQUIDITY GENERATION1%Automatically repurchases  of taxes on transaction deductions automatically add liquidity pool to increaseAUTO REFLECTIONS1% fee of each transaction is reflected to token holders with BTC (Bitcoin) for the value of loyaltyCHARITY1% Fees collected from transaction will be used for community growth and operational expenses !!  The transaction fees will be using for growth the TOCZ project as described above  !!These fees ratios will decrease according to increase the Marketcap of TOCZ and to support for better usage of TOCZ in common areasSTATEMENTSWe could describe here an amazing , shiny , meaningless, roadmap as others but we think that it is not necessary.Our team are consist of fully backed developers.  We could build a defi ,nft market or dao as other memes anytime ;But this kind features are not our main goal ,they are just a similar tools on a these way.Our main goal is to become a sustainable digital currency for store of value to common use cases in a great ecosystem.We will discuss about expension and dapps with our communities in the future by voting in demand of request from  community.“Blockfinder” title  is the secret key feature of TOCZ project which is benefit for TOCZ project ,but we cant explain you all details.Basicly it help to push price of TOCZ up.THANKS FOR READING AND ALL WELCOME TO TOCZ PROJECT –ENJOY THE RIDE– SOCIALS twitter : https://twitter.com/realtoczTelegram : https://t.me/ToczTokenwebsite : www.tocz.org

comments.author: swiftxi
comments.body: Whare the picture, do you know what a meme is , how have meme token and no meme?

comments.author: bobanobunaga
comments.body: Quote from: swiftxi on May 04, 2023, 05:49:04 PMWhare the picture, do you know what a meme is , how have meme token and no meme? What we should do ? Sending meaningless pictures to everywhere  We just have logo in our website , you can take a look to anytime A lot of meme is building daily in ethereum and bnbchain an others , lot of creators using same method to rug people whit hype of fomo and lot of them has vanished timely .Memecoin or memetokens should not be just a joke , it could be using in a different areas as well in common areas . So we see that a lot of project based tokens and coins as well , with very good special graphs in there website or their dapps , apps . You feel that this project will be impact the world And now are they all alive? , are they keep working? , keep building ? Sadly Lot of gone  Dissapeared right ? If so what is the purpose in here right ?  to pick a project or meme to invest ? What is the difference in here ? Let's all be honest with ourselves, investor on this field people are just care about income as like in any other investment areas .
